name: Kaspy
description: Kaspy is a community-driven meme token launched on the Kaspa blockchain, inspired by the heartfelt real-life story of its creator rescuing a three-legged cat named Kaspy. In 2022, the creator sold all their $KASPA holdings to pay for the cat's life-saving vet bills. The token stands as a symbol of resilience and generosity, representing the idea that sometimes the most meaningful acts come from personal sacrifice. Launched through a fair distribution with no pre-allocation,

kasplex.contract_address: KASPY (the Kaspa blockchain does not have smart contracts like Ethereum, meaning there is no "contract address" in the same way. Instead, the KRC-20 tokens are based on a unique ticker system that identifies them within the network.)
